notes: Brexit completed 2020, still in effect 2024. No concrete rejoin movement.
Trump withdrew TPP 2017. Biden launched IPEF (successor framework) 2022-2023. Partial reversal.
Trump withdrew 2017 (effective 2020), Biden rejoined day 1 (Jan 20, 2021). Clean reversal.
Orbán illiberal democracy continues 2024. EU froze funds but no reversal of resistance.
Venezuela denounced IACHR 2012, still outside as of 2024. Maduro regime continues.
CSJN resisted IACHR 2017 (Fontevecchia). Fernández government complied 2020-2024. Gradual reversal.
Bush refused Kyoto 2001. Obama signed Paris Agreement 2015 (successor). Functional replacement.
Maastricht 1992, foundational to EU. Lisbon 2009 amended but didn't reverse. Permanent policy.
Schengen 1985/1995. Temporary suspensions (migration 2015, COVID 2020) but not reversed.
Erdoğan post-coup 2016 froze EU accession. Still stalled 2024, no signs of reversal.
